domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: State of the Union
entity.description: Hosted by CNN's chief Washington correspondent Jake Tapper and journalist Dana Bash, "State of the Union" features one-on-one interviews with top newsmakers on politics and policy. Often joined by a round table of expert guests, the Sunday morning program covers Washington, the country, and the world, and goes beyond the Beltway for a perspective on how everyday Americans are faring.

text: “I’m not going to get into who’s right and who is wrong,” FDA Commissioner Dr. Stephen Hahn says when pressed about the misleading claim President Trump made — that 99% of coronavirus cases in America are "totally harmless." https://t.co/W6TLmb2Uvs #CNNSOTU https://t.co/WpJmQRdGVQ
